root.name: Dukes of Hazzard: Racing for Home
root.description: OverviewDukes of Hazzard: Racing for Home is a racing game developed by Sinister Games (Playstation version), SouthPeak Interactive (PC Version), and Spellbound (Game Boy Color version). Dukes of Hazzard: Racing for Home was published by SouthPeak Interactive for all US versions and Ubisoft for all European releases.
